app.title: PKU Tools
app.long-description: This app is aimed at people with PKU. It combines a calculator, pencil, paper and nutritional table.
app.auth-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try it again. Always use the same login method.
app.redesign: Individual pages are currently being redesigned :) Please be patient.

home.title: Home
home.suggestion: Can be installed on any device (Android, iOS, Mac, Windows).

phe-search.title: Phe Search
phe-search.source: Source: USDA, FoodData Central, 2019 (fdc.nal.usda.gov). As an example, this is also used for nutritional information in the Google sidebar.

protein-calculator.title: Protein Calculator
protein-calculator.description: Calculate approximate phe values from protein.
protein-calculator.name: Food name

barcode-scanner.title: Barcode Scanner
barcode-scanner.info: Phe gets calculated from protein (* 50) / Datasource: openfoodfacts.org

own-food.title: Own Food
own-food.description: Save own food and phe values.
own-food.limit: Own Food is limited to 500 entries.
own-food.search-info: Own food is also available in the search.

phe-log.title: Phe Log
phe-log.description: Log phe values throughout the day.
phe-log.save-diary: Save in Phe Diary and reset Phe Log

phe-diary.title: Phe Diary
phe-diary.description: Log phe values over several days.
phe-diary.limit: The Phe Diary is limited to 100 entries. Export your data in Excel. Reset via Settings.
phe-diary.note: Limited to 100 entries (~3 months). Reset via Settings.
phe-diary.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.

settings.title: Settings
settings.delete-account-info: Only works if the last login was not too long ago. Please log out once and log in again.
settings.delete-account-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try logging out and back in again.

email-auth.title: Sign in with Email
email-auth.description: Alternative to signing in via Google.
email-auth.name: Name
email-auth.reset-note: Receive an email to reset the password.
email-auth.password-sent: Email for password reset has been sent. Please check your emails.

help.title: Help
help.description: Help and FAQ for PKU Tools.
help.install-p1: This web app can be installed on any device like an app.
help.install-p3: In Safari, tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen".
help.install-p4: Click the little installation icon in the address bar in Chrome, Brave or Edge.

features.calculator-description: Calculate the amount of Phe for a specific weight or convert protein to Phe.
features.diary-description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.
features.own-food-description: Save your own foods for quick addition.
features.export-description: Export your data as CSV (compatible with Excel).
